page.title: 11A day in my life
page.content: At about 6.15a.m. I wake up,and go downstairs for a cup of tea and to watch television programmes, moving pictures ona screen, on the video cassettee recorder. My favourite shows are Ready Steady Go, 1960 music, and Fame, about the people in the New York School of Arts. 7.15a.m. is the time I go to have a wash. I use soap, flannel,toothbrush,toothpaste, and towel. On schooldays I wear black corduroy trousers, white socks, a shirt or tea shirt and cardigan or sweatshirt. I the go down for breakfast and have eggs on toast with several cups of tea. At approximately 8.30a.m. I set off to school with my brother and sister. I arrive at school at 8.45a.m. and go straight into the classroom and read or write the days work. In the morning we have an assembly to worship God.
